intro: I'm a passionate technologist with experience in software engineering, artificial intelligence, and data science. My journey began with software development, evolved through data analytics, and now focuses on AI applications.

Highly interested in information technology and artificial intelligence. A dedicated, hard worker, and responsible person who enjoys working as a team. Always seeking to gain more knowledge and experience to get new skills.
When I'm not coding or working on AI projects, I actively contribute to team projects, share knowledge with colleagues, and explore the latest advancements in technology.

expertise.title: Software Engineering
expertise.description: Building scalable microservices applications with modern frameworks and best practices.

expertise.title: Data Science
expertise.description: Extracting insights from complex datasets to drive data-informed decisions.

expertise.title: AI Engineering
expertise.description: Creating intelligent systems using machine learning and deep learning techniques with TensorFlow.

expertise.title: Team Leadership
expertise.description: Leading remote small teams in enhancing backend development with agile methodology.
